name: Call of Cthulhu: Prisoner of Ice
description: As you journey to the seemingly placid surroundings of a Greek courtyard or the secret gardens of Tihuanica, beware - things are not as they seem. This supernatural action adventure is sure to pique your obsession with horror and espionage.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Processor: 2.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 256 MB VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Lol, I can't finish this game.   I knew when I spent my $1.50 that I was buying one the old adventure games where puzzle solutions are a series of random steps that don't really follow common sense of logic, but even with a Walktrhough guide at the ready, this was a horrible chore.  An awful stroll down nostalgia lane.
